title: Bloomberg Markets: Bittles on Stocks Enjoying a Season Tailwind
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bittles on Stocks Enjoying a Season Tailwind
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Bruce Bittles\u0010Chief Investment Strategist\u0010Baird\u0010Discussing equity markets starting the final quarter of the year with a broad-based rally and why he does not see a harsh selloff.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
